content.question: Access to natural resources for businesses changed from the mid-1800s to the late 1800s most directly as a result of which of the following factors?

choices.label: The invention of the automobile and the building of highways
The establishment of national parks for wilderness preservation
The emergence of new scientific theories such as evolution
The expansion of communication systems such as the electric telegraph

content.answer: The expansion of communication systems such as the electric telegraph

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
